thread.title: Coleen Nolan admits that husband Ray ‘changed her son Jake’s life’ after he stopped her from hitting him and altered how they punished him for bad behaviour

author: rhill
title: Coleen Nolan admits that husband Ray ‘changed her son Jake’s life’ after he stopped her from hitting him and altered how they punished him for bad behaviour
text:
TV Magazine 'HE NEVER LOST HIS RAG' Coleen Nolan admits that husband Ray ‘changed her son Jake’s life’ after he stopped her from hitting him and altered how they punished him for bad behaviour 
The Loose Women panellist said that her son 'saw red and all hell broke loose' By ROSE HILL
